dialogue.text: Wow, I'm glad this place turned out to be not as scary as I thought it'd be!
You did a great job making this an adorable little hideaway.
But, It's not supposed to be cute, though...
Mayuka's form changes to pitch black figure and bright glowing eyes. Skelly decides to change the subject.
...Well, anyways, what's with all of the\nthe visitors? The ghosts and cats I mean.
Oh! We let stray cats in here to rest if they need, since FeverTown isn't the safest place...
And ghosts come here to have shelter from the sun if they don't have something for cover!
It's night time right now, though.
This place is also just a nice area to hang out with how big it is. Hard to believe someone just left it here!
I guess that makes sense. Since the others are watching, why don't we sing another song?
I'm getting more comfortable with this, it's fun! This song'll be real spooky.
